p1_main_content: Our company’s anti-vibration rubber manufacturing business has long responded to the high expectations of numerous customers in Japan, including the world’s major automobile manufacturers, who demand the highest level of performance and quality.
p2_quote_part1: We take pride in our corporate philosophy that
p2_quote_philosophy: "Committed to achieving the highest quality for the benefit of society."
p2_quote_part2: And we will continue to strive for continuous development to deliver quality and confidence to customers worldwide.
floating_box2_title: Committed to achieving the highest quality
p1_main_content_info: The company Prospeira has been in the anti-vibration rubber business for a long time, adhering to the philosophy: “Committed to achieving the highest quality for the benefit of society.” Our products are designed to meet real-life daily applications, focusing on durability, performance, and quality that customers can trust.
p2_support_content: We work closely with leading automotive manufacturers and partners in Japan to maintain the highest production standards and continuously develop technology.
mission_content: To provide high-quality products that create value and safety for society.
vision_content: To be a regional leader in anti-vibration material technology, with expansion into the global market.
banner_desc: Our anti-vibration rubber is manufactured using world-leading technology, supported by a fully integrated system covering procurement, production, logistics, and stringent quality management to deliver the highest quality products to customers.
strength1_desc: We develop anti-vibration rubber using leading global technology to ensure the highest quality in every production step.
strength2_desc: From procurement and manufacturing to logistics, we have a system that connects every step for maximum efficiency.
strength3_desc: We adhere to international quality standards, checking every step for maximum customer satisfaction.
strength4_desc: We can design and manufacture according to specific customer requirements to best suit the actual application.
hero_desc_p1: Automotive vibration dampers made with Prospeira's advanced molding and resin processing technology — We manufacture automotive parts such as engine mounts and other vibration damping components under world-class manufacturing systems, aiming to make driving more comfortable and safe.
hero_desc_p2: We manufacture automotive parts like Engine Mounts and other anti-vibration components under a global production system, aiming to make driving safer and more comfortable.
product1_desc: Anti-vibration rubber for vehicles manufactured with technology (resin processing), suitable for applications like Engine Mounts and other components that enhance smoothness and reduce vibration in automobiles.
product2_desc: An Air Spring is a cylindrical component made of rubber and fabric, filled with compressed air. The bellows itself does not directly bear the load, but the internal air pressure supports the force and weight.
product3_desc: Pneumatic Chuck, or an engine mounting part, uses compressed air as a medium to secure the engine, helping to reduce vibration and enhance smoothness in the engine.
banner_desc_p1: Leadership promotes employee ownership, drives innovation, and supports TQM.
content_desc_p1: We are committed to delivering the best to our customers and society, not only in terms of products, services, and technology but also in all our corporate activities.
content_desc_p2: Our commitment to quality does not come at a loss, but from a dedication to enhancing the safety and quality of life for people worldwide. With our mission, we strive to be a globally trusted company that all of us can be proud of.
banner_desc_p1_2: At Prospira, we focus on safety as a core business value.
banner_desc_p2_2: Creating a safe workplace for everyone is everyone's responsibility.
content_title_2: We proudly aim to achieve perfect safety.
content_desc_p1_2: "Safety First, Always" includes preventing all types of work-related accidents,
content_desc_p2_2: whether they are disasters, industrial hygiene issues, or traffic accidents.
banner_desc_3: To help maintain and strengthen a good environment, and pass it on to future generations.
content_desc_3: We are committed to developing products, services, and technology with the utmost responsibility, alongside minimizing environmental impact. We improve work processes to reduce resource consumption and promote sustainability to ensure this world remains a safe home for future generations.
